subject: Re:   ATTN! DEAR! YOUR ATM CARD,
body:
Hello Mr. Harry Alex,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my luck. It's not every day that one hears about an ATM card of a million USD being approved for them. 

Could you please tell me more about how this came to be? How was I chosen for this wonderful opportunity? Also, could you provide some details about the delivery process? I'm really curious to know how it works.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Stacey
